  • onSidebarItemClick('users')}> Users
  • onSidebarItemClick('forums')}> Forums
  • onSidebarItemClick('events')}> Events
  • onSidebarItemClick('gallery')}> Gallery
  • Logout
); }; export default Sidebar;
